com.comphenix.protocol.injector.spigot

Class SpigotPacketInjector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comphenix.protocol.injector.spigot.SpigotPacketInjector

  • public class SpigotPacketInjector
extends java.lang.Object
    Offload all the work to Spigot, if possible.
    Author:
    Kristian

        plugin - - the parent plugin.
        Returns:

      • packetReceived

        public java.lang.Object packetReceived(java.lang.Object networkManager,
                              java.lang.Object connection,
                              java.lang.Object packet)
        Called when a packet has been received and is about to be handled by the current Connection.

        The returned packet will be the packet passed on for handling, or in the case of null being returned, not handled at all.

        Parameters:
        networkManager - - the NetworkManager receiving the packet
        connection - - the connection which will handle the packet
        packet - - the received packet
        Returns:
        the packet to be handled, or null to cancel

      • packetQueued

        public java.lang.Object packetQueued(java.lang.Object networkManager,
                            java.lang.Object connection,
                            java.lang.Object packet)
        Called when a packet is queued to be sent.

        The returned packet will be the packet sent. In the case of null being returned, the packet will not be sent.

        Parameters:
        networkManager - - the NetworkManager which will send the packet
        connection - - the connection which queued the packet
        packet - - the queue packet
        Returns:
        the packet to be sent, or null if the packet will not be sent.
